column6:
Two more stories from the world of the web-slinger! First, a band of amateur filmmakers set out to duplicate the wall-crawler's fantastic feats in an offbeat tale by Joe Hill and Seth Fisher. Then, Spidey is caught at the epicenter of an earthquake, courtesy of Joshua Ortega and Ryan Sook.,2005,3
32 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Shinkiro | penciller:Seth Fisher | penciller:Ryan Sook | writer:Joe Hill | writer:Joshua Ortega
